text: Atamutaiya makkale! (En) tutarkal unkalil irunte niccayamaka unkalitam vantu en vacanankalai meyyakave unkalukku otik kanpikkumpotu, (avarrai ceviyurra unkalil) evarkal allahvukkup payantu, (pavankaliliruntu) vilaki, narceyalkalaic ceykirarkalo avarkalukku ettakaiya payamumillai; avarkal tuyaram ataiyavum mattarkal
